AppConfigurations.Instruction: Respond with a single integer number based on  my message that I will provide in the "Message" section. Rules: 1. If the message is related to FIRE, the number must be strictly LESS THAN 50. 2. If the message is NOT related to fire, the number must be GREATER THAN 50 and LESS THAN 100. Output ONLY the raw number, without any additional text.  Answer with, for example, 20 if the message is "Smoke"
